name: Image Delusion VR - SexVersion
description:
■Game Contents

Let's have sex with your favorite 2D characters!
In this game, you can place your favorite images on VR or MR and play with them.

■How to play

in ImageDelusionSexVR/ImageDelusionSex_Data/CustomData.
Put the images in the respective folders.
Run the included "ImageDelusionSex.exe".

Supported image formats are bmp jpg gif png.　
Transparent png is supported.　Animated gifs are not supported.

■ゲーム内容

Open an image from the menu and place any number of images anywhere, in VR or MR

Images can be scaled, and further images, sounds, and tongue models can be added to the image.

A variety of play modes for sex


■Operation

"Left analog stick" Move
"Right analog stick" Turn, height adjustment
"Trigger" Select
"Grip" Hold
"AX button" Mini-Menu
"BY button" Menu
"Menu" Tap to open mini menu : press and hold to open menu
"Grip + Trigger" Item action while holding an item : Ejaculation meter increases while not holding anything
"Grip + A, B, X, Y" Item menu while holding an item

■Operating Environment
MetaQuest2(OculusLink)
MetaQuest3(OculusLink)
HtcVive
